mapper.insert:
insert into db_proxy.sardine_pickupbill
uuid,
billNumber,
companyUuid,
state,
type,
method,
sourceBillUuid,
sourceBillNumber,
sourceBillType,
pickOrder,
deliveryType,
customeruuid,
pickeruuid,
pickercode,
pickername,
pickAreauuid,
pickAreacode,
pickAreaname,
remark,
VERSION,
createdTime, createdId, createdCode, createdName, lastModifyTime, lastModifyId, lastModifyCode, lastModifyName,

#{billNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update db_proxy.sardine_pickupbill
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickeruuid=null, pickercode=null, pickername=null,
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickeruuid = #{picker.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickercode = #{picker.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickername = #{picker.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickOrderLevel = #{pickOrderLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} + 1,
LASTMODIFYTIME = #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTMODIFYID = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFYCODE = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFYNAME = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version = #{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.*, c.code customerCode, c.name customerName from db_proxy.sardine_pickupbill t, db_proxy.sardine_customer c where t.customeruuid = c.uuid and t.uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.*, c.code customerCode, c.name customerName from db_proxy.sardine_pickupbill t, db_proxy.sardine_customer c where t.customeruuid = c.uuid and t.sourceBillUuid = #{waveUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update db_proxy.sardine_pickupbill set state = #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYTIME = #{date, jdbcTYPE=DATE}, LASTMODIFYID = #{user.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYCODE = #{user.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYNAME = #{user.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sourceBilltype = '波次单' and sourceBillnumber = #{waveBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and companyUuid = #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
